an10.47:1: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Vesālī in the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood. Then Mahāli the Licchavi approached the Blessed One, paid homage to him, sat down to one side, and said to him:
an10.47:2: "Bhante, what is the cause and condition for the doing of good kamma, for the occurrence of good kamma?"
